DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Predefined generic type for a building element proxy that is specified in an enumeration. There may be a property set given specificly for the predefined types.
NOTE  The PredefinedType shall only be used, if no IfcBuildingElementProxyType is assigned, providing its own IfcBuildingElementProxyType.PredefinedType.
IFC4 CHANGE  The attribute CompositionType has been replaced by PredefinedType, being a superset of the enumerators.

DocWhereRule.Name: HasObjectName
DocWhereRule.Documentation: A Name attribute should be asserted for a building element proxy.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the PredefinedType attribute is unset (e.g. because an IfcBuildingElementProxyType is associated), or the inherited attribute ObjectType shall be provided, if the PredefinedType is set to USERDEFINED.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no building element proxy type object associated, i.e. the IsTypedBy inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type IfcBuildingElementProxyType.
